channel.title: Web3 Security Paper Digest
channel.description: Curated papers on Web3, blockchain, and smart contract security from ArXiv and ACL

item.title: BugSweeper: Function-Level Detection of Smart Contract Vulnerabilities Using Graph Neural Networks
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces BugSweeper, an end-to-end deep learning framework that detects smart contract vulnerabilities directly from Solidity source code without handcrafted rules.
  • Represents each function as a Function-Level Abstract Syntax Graph (FLAG) that fuses AST with enriched control-flow and data-flow semantics.
  • Employs a two-stage Graph Neural Network: first-stage GNN to filter noise in syntax graphs and second-stage GNN for high-level reasoning, achieving superior performance on real-world contracts.

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Uisang Lee', 'Changhoon Chung', 'Junmo Lee', 'Soo-Mook Moon']
  • Tags: ['Smart contract security', 'Vulnerability detection', 'Graph Neural Networks', 'Static analysis', 'Solidity']
